sourceMeaningMnemonic: You're in the <radical>sun</radical> playing <radical>football</radical> and you get very <kanji>warm</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Feel how warm the sun is, as you try to throw and catch the football.
readingMnemonic: It's <kanji>warm</kanji> like this because it's <reading>dawn</reading> (<ja>だん</ja>). That's when the sun comes up.
readingInfo: Dang, you knew you should have played night football so it wouldn't get so warm. Now the dawn sun is making you uncomfortable under all those layers of football protection.
